Source.Name: perl-DateTime-Format-W3CDTF
Source.Summary: DateTime::Format::W3CDTF - Parse and format W3CDTF datetime strings
Source.Description: This module understands the W3CDTF date/time format, an ISO 8601 profile, defined at http://www.w3.org/TR/NOTE-datetime. This format as the native date format of RSS 1.0.
